message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to me is no more than $8,000.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is my bottom line. This product is worth a significant amount to me, and I'm confident it will bring you value as well.

I understand that $12,000 is your bottom line, but I'm still trying to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,500 for the product. I think this is a reasonable compromise considering its worth to me is no more than $8,000.
